headline: Jim Cramer Expects a Great Quarter From Microsoft
summary: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the stocks in focus in the game plan Jim Cramer shared. Cramer has high hopes for the company’s quarter as he remarked: “Microsoft reported the best quarter of the hyperscalers last time around, and I expect a repeat from this company.” Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) develops and provides software, hardware, […]
